operation.expression: util:iif((fn:string-length($temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode )>2 and fn:string-length($temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode)<11 ) or fn:contains("$temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode"," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode","[a-z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode","[A-Z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode","[0-9]","s"),fn:upper-case( fn:normalize-space($temp.SF_Account_Data.BillingPostalCode)),'')

util:iif(util:isNull($temp.V_Customer_Company_Status ),'Active',util:decode($temp.V_Customer_Company_Status ,'Status Quo', 'Active',('Merger, Acquisition or Spinoff','Active','Key Contact Departure','Inactive','Customer Financial Distress or Bankruptcy ','Inactive'),'Inactive'))

util:iif( util:isNull($temp.physical_address_line_1 ),$temp.physical_address_line_1 ,$temp.physical_address_line_1 )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.physical_city ),$temp.physical_city ,' | '||$temp.physical_city )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.physical_county ),$temp.physical_county ,' | '||$temp.physical_county )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.physical_country ),$temp.physical_country ,' | '||$temp.physical_country )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.physical_postal_code ),$temp.physical_postal_code ,' | '||$temp.physical_postal_code )

util:iif( util:isNull($temp.finance_address_line_1 ),$temp.finance_address_line_1 ,$temp.finance_address_line_1 )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.finance_city ),$temp.finance_city ,' | '||$temp.finance_city )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.finance_county ),$temp.finance_county ,' | '||$temp.finance_county )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.finance_country ),$temp.finance_country ,' | '||$temp.finance_country )|| util:iif( util:isNull($temp.finance_postal_code ),$temp.finance_postal_code ,' | '||$temp.finance_postal_code )

util:iif(($temp.Tmp_physical_address_line_1 = '' or util:isNull($temp.Tmp_physical_address_line_1 )) and ($temp.Tmp_physical_city = '' or util:isNull($temp.Tmp_physical_city )) and ($temp.Tmp_physical_county = '' or util:isNull($temp.Tmp_physical_county )) and ($temp.Tmp_physical_postal_code = '' or util:isNull($temp.Tmp_physical_postal_code )) , '' ,$temp.Tmp_Physical_Address )

assignment.title: Assignment to Recipient Addresses, Subject etc.

operation.expression: fn:concat('PROD || ' ,'Prc_MDM_Vforce_Opportunity_To_C360 has failed for Account Name - ',$temp.name )

fn:concat('Hello Team','
','
','Process Name : Prc_MDM_Vforce_Opportunity_To_C360 has failed while Inserting the record in Customer 360 ','
','
','Account Name : ',$temp.name ,'
','
','Error Code : ',$output.faultInfo[1]/code,'
','
','Error Details : ',$output.faultInfo[1]/reason ,'
','

','

','MDM Support Team')
